SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Net Profit Margin ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Net Profit Margin  is Renewable Energy Investment Ratio

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Revenue Growth Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Net Profit Margin  is R&D Investment Ratio.

SRP.Q: On the Market Share, is the point for Bennett-Glenn inside or outside the point for Burke Inc?
SRP.A: On the Market Share, the point for Bennett-Glenn is outside the point for Burke Inc.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {R&D Investment Ratio} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Bennett-Glenn?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {R&D Investment Ratio}, while the weakest aspect is{ Revenue Growth Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Revenue Growth Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Revenue Growth Rate, label {Bennett-Glenn} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Renewable Energy Investment Ratio, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Renewable Energy Investment Ratio, label {Bennett-Glenn} scores the lowest.

NC.A: {Net Profit Margin } has a higher score than Revenue Growth Rate for Burke Inc.

NC.Q: For Bennett-Glenn, which dimension has a higher score: R&D Investment Ratio or Patent Growth Rate?

MSR.Q: For Bennett-Glenn, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Bennett-Glenn most needs to improve its {Revenue Growth Rate}.

MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Bennett-Glenn}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
